title: Tell me about your favorite TV show.

korean: 제가 제일 좋아하는 프로그램은 '유 퀴즈 온 더 블럭'이에요.
음, 이 프로그램은 유재석이랑 조세호가 진행하는 토크쇼인데요,
매주 다양한 분야의 사람들을 초대해서 인터뷰하는 형식이에요.
유명한 사람도 나오지만, 평범한 사람들 이야기도 많이 다뤄요.
그게 좋은 게, 진짜 감동적인 이야기들이 많거든요.
특히 유재석 씨가 질문을 정말 잘해서 게스트들이 편하게 얘기하더라고요.
웃기기도 하고 감동적이기도 해서 보는 내내 재밌어요.
한번은 평범한 택시 기사님 나오셨는데, 너무 감동적이어서 울었어요.
친구들이랑도 이 프로그램 얘기 자주 하고요.
방송 끝나고 나면 SNS에서도 화제가 되곤 해요.
english: My favorite program is 'You Quiz on the Block'.
Um, this program is a talk show hosted by Yoo Jae-suk and Jo Se-ho,
and the format is inviting people from various fields and interviewing them every week.
Famous people appear, but they also cover stories of ordinary people a lot.
What's good about it is there are many really touching stories.
Especially Yoo Jae-suk asks questions really well, so guests talk comfortably.
It's both funny and touching, so it's fun throughout watching.
Once an ordinary taxi driver appeared, and it was so touching that I cried.
It airs every Wednesday, and I look forward to that day.
I often talk about this program with friends too.
After the broadcast ends, it often becomes a topic on SNS.
I hope it broadcasts for a long, long time in the future.
